attributes.action: People of Britain wish all PRO EU MP's in Parliament to Resign. Pro British Gov.
attributes.additional_details: martin Barrett, Eric Ginn George , Debbie Sherwood, Linda Lindsay, Pete Con, Bill  stephenson
attributes.background: We the British people wish all Pro EU MPs apart from the SNP  to resign and be replaced with Pro British MPs . Important Negotiation's are to start with the EU and we want a Strong Government on our side. It is untenable that MP's supported Foreign Political rule should be in the discussions.
